title: Change hero description paragraph text color to light black (dark gray)

requirements.text: In the Hero section component (frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx), apply a light black / dark gray color (Tailwind class `text-gray-600` or equivalent) to the descriptive paragraph text: 'Join the Millet Revolution for sustainable food processing. At Aparna Millets, we are pioneering tasty distributes of healthcare-certified millet products and supporting smallholders with sustainable trade, contract farming, and value-adding processing. Marketplace innovation, sustainable cash crop support, chemical-free cultivation, and healthcare-certified millet products.' so it renders as a softer dark gray rather than full black or white.

quotes: Join the Millet Revolution for sustainable food processing. At Aparna Millets, we are pioneering tasty distributes of healthcare-certified millet products and supporting smallholders with sustainable trade, contract farming, and value-adding processing. Marketplace innovation, sustainable cash crop support, chemical-free cultivation, and healthcare-certified millet products. make this sentence light black color

acceptanceCriteria: The descriptive paragraph in the Hero section renders with a light black / dark gray color (e.g., `text-gray-600` or `#4B5563`).
The text is clearly readable against the hero background.
No other text elements in the Hero section are unintentionally affected by this color change.
The fallback/default paragraph text also uses the same dark gray color class.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui (immutable paths).
Only change the color styling of the specified paragraph text in the Hero component; do not alter layout, font size, or content.
nonGoals: Changing colors of any other text elements outside the specified Hero paragraph.
Modifying backend content or data structures.
